actions.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 246.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-719, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

official_title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

summary.text: Waives the requirement of Rule XIII of the House of Representatives for a two-thirds vote to consider a report from the Committee on Rules on the same day it is presented to the House with respect to any resolution reported on December 6, 2006, providing for consideration of a bill to to extend certain expiring provisions the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
